premise_source_doc_sentence: Alvin Ward Gouldner  (  July 29 , 1920 -- December 15 , 1980  )  taught sociology at Antioch College  (  1952-1954  )  and was professor of sociology at Washington University in St. Louis  (  1957 -- 1967  )  , at the University at Buffalo  (  1947-1952  )  , President of the Society for the Study of Social Problems  (  1962  )  , professor of sociology at the University of Amsterdam  (  1972 -- 1976  )  and Max Weber Professor of Sociology at Washington University  (  from 1967  )  .
